name: Scale Functor
intent: Map scale indices to semantic systems, forming the backbone of the SFO.
algebraic\_properties: F respects composition and identities of the Scale category.
Morphisms in Scale (n \-\> m) map to structure-preserving morphisms of semantic systems S\_n \-\> S\_m.
constraints: F must admit a projective limit Lim(F) to define the SFO core.
F must preserve the Tri-Unity structure (δ, Φ, Π) across scales, modulo allowed rescalings.
